title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Ongoing Conflict”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesman:

The IDF continues to attack Hezbollah terrorist organization targets in Southern Lebanon.

A short while ago, air force combat aircraft attacked several military buildings of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the areas of Al-Tzivanah and Ramieh, alongside the organization’s terror infrastructure in the Yaroun area.

An air force aircraft attacked Hezbollah terrorists in the Chanin area in southern Lebanon.

Following alarms in the north of the country, about 20 launches that crossed from Lebanon to various areas were identified, and a number of falls were identified in the settlement areas of Dovev and Manara that caused damage. IDF forces attacked the shooting sources with artillery.

In addition, several alarms were activated for the intrusion of a hostile aircraft in several areas, one of which successfully intercepted an aerial target by air defense fighters in the Dishon area.
Following the alarm that activated a short time ago in the Upper Galilee area and the alarm activated in the Kela and Shaal areas, this was a false alarm.

There are no casualties in any of the incidents.

Attached is documentation of the attack in the Chanin area in southern Lebanon: https://bit.ly/3Ke3Ylh
